articles.title: Russia sentences US teacher to 14 years for cannabis smuggling
articles.description: Former US embassy employee Marc Fogel was detained in mid-August at Sheremetyevo airport.
articles.content:

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Remains of UK journalist Phillips identified in Brazil
articles.description: UK journalist Dom Phillips and indigenous expert Bruno Pereira went missing in the Amazon on 5 June.
articles.content: Mr Phillips, 57, and Mr Pereira, 41, were first reported missing on 5 June. Earlier this week, a suspect confessed to burying the bodies.
